Control.Name: DebugButton
Control.Tooltip: Enable Debug Mode. (Note this will diminish the add-on's performance considerably).

Control.Name: CloseAndIgnoreChatTabButton
Control.Tooltip: This will close the chat tab and ignore incoming messages until you manulally open it again.

Control.Text: /Because input prompt doesn't work on multi-line, or so it seems.
Control.Name: ChatInputPrompt

Control.Text: Who's API is under cooldown. Wait a moment then try again.
Control.Name: IsApiInCoolDown

Control.Text: Biography request is taking a while. The Com channel might be busy in which case you may try again later.
Control.Name: IsResquestingBioTimeOut

Control.Text: Addon cannot reach players on the other faction. Until Carbine decides otherwise, this profile is classified.
Control.Name: IsResquestingBioCrossFaction

Control.Text: While you're able to leave some Standard channels, the server will likely auto-join them next session.
Control.Name: Notice
SharePlayersChannelsButton
Control.Tooltip: This enables other players to discover new custom channels they may not know yet.

Control.Name: InfoButton
Control.Tooltip: This enables other players to discover new custom channels they may not know yet.

Control.Text: Here you can write whatever you want to whoever may want to read it. It can be an invitation to your housing plot, a guild recruitment Ad or a biography for your role play character. Or leave it blank. Up to you. Other Jita users will have a blue user icon next to their names in chat roster.
Control.Name: Description
InfoButton
Control.Tooltip: Biogrpahy field is limited to 1024 characters.

Control.Name: InfoButton
Control.Tooltip: "Inherit" to inherit ChatLog colors, or set one unified color instead (a complete color palette to pick color by channel is in future plan).

Control.Name: AutoHideChatLogWindows
Control.Text: Hide Carbine's Stock UI ChatLog Windows

Control.Name: ChatWindow_AutoHideChatTabs
Control.Text: Auto Hide Chat Tabs in Ghost Mode

Control.Name: ChatWindow_RosterLeftClickInfo
Control.Text: Show Character Profile when Left Clicking on Their Name

Control.Name: ChatWindow_MessageShowChannelName
Control.Text: Show Channel Name in Inline Mode

Control.Name: InfoButton
Control.Tooltip: Channel names are enabled by default on General chat tab.

Control.Name: ChatWindow_ChatInputAutoSetFocus
Control.Text: Set Chat Input on Focus When Clicking on Chat Windows

Control.Name: ChatWindow_UseCustomBackgroundPicture
Control.Text: Use a Custom Background Picture For Chat Windows

Control.Name: InfoButton
Control.Tooltip: Next step is to override "Addons\Jita\background.png" with a 1280 x 720px picture of your choosing. May require existing game client to apply.

Control.Name: ChatWindow_MessageShowTextFloater
Control.Text: Show Relevant Messages in TextFloater When In Overlay Mode

Control.Name: InfoButton
Control.Tooltip: Share your character's location along your biography. When disabled, other Jita instances will fall-back to Who API. Main difference is that Jita will send residence's name when you're at Skymap.

Control.Name: ChatWindow_MessageAlienateOutOfRange
Control.Text: Show Out of Range Messages in Alien Font (otherwise they get dropped)

Control.Name: ChatWindow_MessageShowPlayerRange
Control.Text: Show Player Range in Local Chat

Control.Name: ChatWindow_MessageAlertPlayerInRange
Control.Text: Alert When a Player Enters 20 meters Chat Range

Control.Name: InfoButton
Control.Tooltip: Detection of nearby units is slowed down in populated areas and disabled while your character is in combat or dead.

Control.Name: InfoButton
Control.Tooltip: Your character first and last names are implicitly included as keywords.

Control.Name: ChatWindow_MessageKeywordPlaySound
Control.Text: Play Alert Sound For keywords Found In Chat
